channel.title: Users on SiriDB documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Users on SiriDB documentation

item.title: create user
item.description: Create a new user. This will create a new user without access to SiriDB. For more information on how to grant access to a user see grant access. Syntax create user 'my-username' set password 'my-password' Examples # This will create a new user 'iris' with password 'siri' create user 'iris' set password 'siri' # Grant "read" access to "iris" grant read to user "iris"

item.title: count users
alter user
item.description: Change the name or password of a user. Syntax alter user 'username' set <option> Example # Change the password for "iris" to "siri" alter user 'iris' set password 'siri'
